bibl.title: Agricultural Productivity and Taxation in Later Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Versions of this paper have been delivered at Columbia University, The University of Toronto, and the University of Florence. - I. The Decline in Production in Fayum Villages (1. Karanis; - 2. Ptolemais Nea; - 3. Hiera Nesos; - 4. Kerkesoucha; - 5. Theadelphia). - II. Productivity and Taxes.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., Agricultural Productivity and Taxation in Later Roman Egypt.

Versions of this paper have been delivered at Columbia University, The University of Toronto, and the University of Florence. - I. The Decline in Production in Fayum Villages (1. Karanis; - 2. Ptolemais Nea; - 3. Hiera Nesos; - 4. Kerkesoucha; - 5. Theadelphia). - II. Productivity and Taxes.
